title: Message from the President Regarding the National Security Strategy | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 27, 2010

 



Message from the President Regarding the National Security Strategy




TO THE CONGRESS OF THE UNITED STATES:
Consistent with section 108 of the National Security Act of 1947, as amended (50 U.S.C. 404a), I am transmitting the National Security Strategy of the United States.
BARACK OBAMA
THE WHITE HOUSE,
May 27, 2010.
